channel.title: Generative Ai on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Generative Ai on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: States take the lead in AI regulation as federal government steers clear
item.description: All 50 states have introduced AI-related legislation this year.

item.title: Amazon is considering shoving ads into Alexa+ conversations
item.description: Amazon has failed to make Alexa profitable thus far.

item.title: So far, only one-third of Americans have ever used AI for work
item.description: AP survey shows most Americans treat AI chatbots like a search engine replacement.

item.title: Two major AI coding tools wiped out user data after making cascading mistakes
item.description: “I have failed you completely and catastrophically,” wrote Gemini.

item.title: Netflix’s first show with generative AI is a sign of what’s to come in TV, film
item.description: The Eternaut debuted on Netflix with a generative AI-assisted scene.
